prototype.async.server

Class CarServer

extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • receive

        public void receive()
        Instantiate Server Socket in channel Variable. The receive Method returns a ServerRSocketFactory whcih is configured down below. The acceptor takes a Lambda for a SocketAcceptor Class which returns an AbstractSocket Instance. The AbstractSocket Instance override's one of the four Interaction Models for RSocket: channel. The requestChannel takes a Publisher, transforms it to a Flux, configure a delay for each Measurement and return it to the Caller respective Car Instance. The transport Methode configures the Protocol TCP, because it is a more stable than UDP. The start Method returns a Mono <Disposable> of a successful established hosted Server in a blocking manner because we only have one Server.

      • close

        public void close()
        Dispose from incoming Connections.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String... args)
